Description: Net-sinker, made of brown steatite, roughly rectangular in section, one end is tapered, the other is very short and is probably broken off. There are two grooves incised, one is very wide, the other at the short end seems very shallow and much narrower. The surface is uneven, concave on the underside, partly smoothed, partly rough.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Amara West (Nubia), E12.5 above Ramesside floor
